Class BaseManagerOfficerRegistration

java.lang.Object
BaseManagerOfficerRegistration
All Implemented Interfaces:
I_ManagerOfficerRegistration
Direct Known Subclasses:
ManagerOfficerRegistration
public abstract class BaseManagerOfficerRegistration extends Object implements I_ManagerOfficerRegistration
Base class for managing officer registration processes.

This class provides methods to approve or reject officer registrations and view enquiries.

See Also:

  • HDBOfficer

  • Method Details

    • rejectRegistration

      public void rejectRegistration(String filePath, String officerNRIC, HDBOfficer officer, Project project)
      Rejects an officer's registration.

      This helper method updates the officer's registration status from "PENDING" to "REJECTED" in the officer registration file. The update is performed by locating the record matching the specified officer NRIC.

      Specified by:
      rejectRegistration in interface I_ManagerOfficerRegistration
      Parameters:
      filePath - The path to the directory containing the registration file (must not be null)
      officerNRIC - The NRIC of the officer to reject (must not be null or empty, used as unique identifier)
      officer - The HDB officer object to be rejected
      project - The project associated with the officer's registration

    • approveRegistration

      public void approveRegistration(String filePath, String officerNRIC, HDBOfficer officer, Project project)
      Approve an officer's registration.

      This helper method updates the officer's registration status from "PENDING" to "APPROVED" in the officer registration file. The update is performed by locating the record matching the specified officer NRIC.

      Specified by:
      approveRegistration in interface I_ManagerOfficerRegistration
      Parameters:
      filePath - The path to the directory containing the registration file (must not be null)
      officerNRIC - The NRIC of the officer to reject (must not be null or empty, used as unique identifier)
      officer - The HDB officer object to be approved
      project - The project associated with the officer's registration

    • viewEnquiries

      public void viewEnquiries(ArrayList<Project> currentProjects)
      Displays the list of pending or completed officer registration requests.

      This method reads the officer registration file and prints the details of each request.

      Specified by:
      viewEnquiries in interface I_ManagerOfficerRegistration
      Parameters:
      currentProjects - The list of current projects (must not be null)
